jobListings.title: Cognitive-Behavioral Oriented Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Our client, a high-standard private psychology center with a cognitive-behavioral orientation and a long track record with a high volume of visits, is seeking autonomous psychologists (with experience in patient care under a cognitive-behavioral approach) with a Master's in General Health Psychology and studies or experience in cognitive-behavioral orientation to join their team to attend to patients remotely in their Employee Assistance Program provided to companies in Spanish territory.

Education and Experience

Bachelor's degree in Psychology.
Master's in General Health Psychology and/or Health Certification.
Experience or studies in cognitive-behavioral orientation will be valued.
Native English speaker or C2 level.
Minimum of 2 years of experience.

What do we offer?

Flexible schedule and 100% remote work.
Continuous training.
Growth plan.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Who are we?

Hiwell is Turkey's largest online therapy platform, chosen by more than 350,000 clients and a pool of 1,000 psychologists. We aim to establish the healthiest communication between clients and expert psychologists through our website and mobile application.

How do we work?

With our mobile application, our clients can quickly and practically receive services from our expert psychologists. We prioritize working with psychologists who have completed their master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Couple and Family Therapy, have received or are receiving supervision, and prioritize ethical work.

Hiwell offers a completely online work environment, allowing you to work from any city at any time.

● Graduated with a degree in Psychology,
● Possess a master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Couple and Family Therapy,
● Proficient in therapy practices,
● Experienced in client follow-up,
● Knowledgeable about methods and technologies related to the field,
● Have received or are currently receiving supervision,
● Value ethical principles.

If you meet the above qualifications, we eagerly await your application!

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
A Clinical Psychologist is needed to work full-time with semi-flexible hours as the owner of their own business under the umbrella of the myPsikolog International Clinic.

Average Monthly Salary Paid by the Institution: 43,200 TL

Average Monthly Net Salary Received by the Psychologist: 36,000.00 TL

Job Post Owner: myPsikolog International Clinic

Clinic's Area of Influence: Turkey and Europe

Work Type: Online

Workplace: Home/Remote

Business Model: Franchising

Hiring Method: Interview

Psychology Degree: Mandatory

Master's in Clinical Psychology: Mandatory

Once the Psychologist is Accepted:

Orientation Training: Yes

Orientation/Training Duration: 5 Days

Orientation/Training Location: Kayseri

Is Training Mandatory: Yes

Number of Sessions Conducted Per Day: 6-8

Is the Job Full-Time: Yes

Is the Psychologist Their Own Boss: Yes

Can the Psychologist Determine Their Working Hours: Yes

Bonus: Yes

Birthday Leave: Yes

Conditions:

- Our partner psychologist cannot engage in any other job besides this one (except for academic activities).

- The psychologist cannot accept clients outside the institution's clients.

- The psychologist cannot maintain an online presence professionally.

- Successful interviewees must come to Kayseri for a 5-day orientation process.

Psychologists' Opinions About This Job:

Psychologist Video-1:

https://vimeo.com/867177985?share=copy

Psychologist Video-2:

https://vimeo.com/854963015?share=copy

Psychologist Video-3:

https://vimeo.com/854961957?share=copy

Psychologist Video-4:

https://vimeo.com/860952614?share=copy

Psychologist Video-5:

https://vimeo.com/854961755?share=copy

Job Location And Accommodation in Kayseri:

Our clinic is located in the center of Kayseri. During the 5-day orientation process, the psychologist resides in Kayseri. During this period, we get to know the person who will carry our brand and complete various in-house training sessions here. Accommodation preferences of our psychologists are their responsibility, but we provide assistance.

Clinic's Website:

www.mypsikolog.com

Clinic's Instagram Account:

www.instagram.com/mypsikologofficial

Clinic's Management Center Address:

Ofisim Kayseri Plaza - A Blok Kat:13 No:50

Kocasinan/Kayseri

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking to hire a Psychologist and Psychological Counselor to be employed in our institution.

We are looking for a teammate who adopts corporate values, is inclined to teamwork, wants to develop managerial skills, is open to change and development, and has strong communication and representation skills.
